Title: Relates to high school equivalency diplomas
Summary: Prohibits a fee for admission to any exam that would award a high school equivalency diploma.
LawCode: Add §317-a, amd §§355, 6206 & 6301, Ed L; amd §97-hhh, St Fin L; amd §336, Soc Serv L; amd §§803 & 2, Cor L; amd §§3-209 & 21-703, NYC Ad Cd; amd §58, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, the state finance law, the social services law, the correction law, the administrative code of the city of New York and the civil service law, in relation to high school equivalency diplomas
